agents/sub-agents/docs-sag/skills/draft-.name: draft-quality
agents/sub-agents/docs-sag/skills/draft-.description: DocsSAG-only preflight for Markdown drafts: verify outline coverage, SSOT terminology, draft quality rubric adherence, severity logging, release readiness gates, Flow Runner trace linkage, and publication sign-off requirements.

skills/api-design/SKILL.md.name: api-design
skills/api-design/SKILL.md.description: Apply to REST and OpenAPI design tasks: draft CRUD resources, pagination contracts, request/response schemas, HTTP status guidance, rate limit headers, and governance-aligned API documentation.

skills/document-triage/SKILL.md.name: document-triage
skills/document-triage/SKILL.md.description: Apply to DocsSAG and KnowledgeMag triage: backlog grooming, severity tagging, metadata freshness checks, release note routing, ownership hand-offs, remediation tracking, and publication readiness coordination.

skills/flow-runner-guardrails/SKILL.md.name: flow-runner-guardrails
skills/flow-runner-guardrails/SKILL.md.description: Use when maintaining Flow Runner skills execution guardrails: manage skills_exec feature flags, allowlist hashes, sandbox expectations, and telemetry for approved scripts.

skills/security-review/SKILL.md.name: security-review
skills/security-review/SKILL.md.description: Apply to security reviews covering authn/authz changes, threat modeling, SBOM coverage, secret management, push protection, incident response runbooks, GovernanceSAG compliance checklists, and escalation contact updates.
